items.sentence: Tom didn\'t know how to express his thanks in French.

If it were not for water, no one could live on earth.
If you act like a child, you will be treated as such.
Tom will never understand why people don\'t like him.
Tom won\'t likely be able to cope with the situation.
Tom\'s father is Canadian and his mother is Japanese.
Tom\'s father remarried after his mother passed away.
Tom\'s grandfather was a concentration camp survivor.
You shouldn\'t interfere in other people\'s business.
